description: Organic Carbon Content In Topsoils In Europe (OCTOP) - ESDAC makes available the Maps of Organic carbon content (%) in the surface horizon of soils in Europe. Resolution: 1 km - Year: 2004. The result is available as a map and an explaining booklet: The Map of Organic Carbon Content In Topsoils In Europe: Version 1.2 September - 2003 (S.P.I.04.72).
title: Factor humus content
